Paravel is a leading travel brand with premium, impeccably designed, sustainable travel goods: companions for all journeys. Paravel exists to celebrate the joy of travel, to better serve the environment, and to inspire all to see the world—and leave the earth a better place worth exploring.

We launched Paravel two years ago with the goal of creating the perfect designer-quality travel accessories without the sky-high designer price tags. As fashion-industry veterans, we knew it was possible to create FUNCTIONAL bags that LOOK GREAT. Our bags are made from the highest quality ...
